name: Elixir of Immortality II: The League of Immortality
name_original: Elixir of Immortality II: The League of Immortality
description:
Something is scaring your small town to death! Now the mayor has been found dead, and there are strange claw and teeth marks all over his body. The only good news? One of the best detectives in the country has agreed to take the case. Help the investigation by searching for clues and interrogating suspects. Learn the incredible truth about an immortality elixir and an eerie secret league in this head-spinning tale of beasts and betrayal!

You can play "The League of Immortality" as a "hidden object" game, or as a classic adventure game devoid of any "hidden object" episodes. Choose the best way to enjoy your grand adventure!
